title: The Remnants
description: A mistaken remedy inflames the erotic passions of two strangers. A jealous brother vows to have his brother’s girl, one way or the other. A massive forest fire set to devastate lives instead illuminates extraordinary powers. A cruel cartel boss kidnaps and murders on an international scale.Krystal Kidd’s action-filled adventure-romance, interweaves the lives of three women and those who love them. Scottish-born twins Nessa & Fia, and their friend Xochitl, a Nahautl Indian from Mexico, seek only success for their small B&B on the central California coast. Yet, love finds them each in a unique way, then each almost loses it.The three find their quiet lives shattered by murder, gold and lust. Nessa’s quiet healing skill saves lives and cures wounds. Malcolm, her lover, is stunned to realize the true depth of her special gifts. Fia’s quick thinking saves a family’s livelihood and builds a deep bond with her lover Zeru. Xochi and her mother cope with unbearable sorrow.
author: Krystal Kidd
